name: Dystopian Runner
description:
Dystopian Run is an infinitely-scrolling 2D runner game about running away from a police-bot. The game takes place in a dystopian future. That's about it.

Forgive my pixel art skills as I am no expert at creating pixel art and even more so at animating it.

Everything is created by me except for the background music which was made by Eric Skiff (Underclocked - No Copyright) and the sound effects were generated by sfxr. 

Huge thanks to them and I hope you like my small game as much as I had fun making it :D
